[[Image:ImgBurn on ubuntu.png|thumb|300px|ImgBurn on [[ubuntu]], via [[wine software|wine]]]]
'''ImgBurn''' is a [[freeware]] program that allows the [[CD recorder|recording]] of many types of [[CD]]/[[DVD]] images to recordable media (.cue files are supported as of version 2.4.0.0). Starting with version 2.0.0.0, ImgBurn can also burn files and data directly to CD/DVD. It supports padding DVD-Video files so the layer break occurs on a proper cell boundary (where possible).
'''ImgBurn''' is a [[freeware]] program that allows the [[CD recorder|recording]] of many types of [[CD]]/[[DVD]] images to recordable media (.cue files are supported as of version 2.4.0.0). Starting with version 2.0.0.0, ImgBurn can also burn files and data directly to CD/DVD. It supports padding DVD-Video files so the layer break occurs on a proper cell boundary (where possible).
